name: TED Runs
description:
TED talks are boring, let's see TED run! Dodge whatever they throw at you using WASD or Arrow keys. Survive and run as long as possible in this infinite-runner Nokia phone themed minigame.


Controls

WUpALeftSDownDRight

This game was made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 4 using DragonRuby in 5 days.

This was my first game using DragonRuby.

The game is 84x48 pixel resolution with monophonic sound for the most authentic Nokia gaming experience.

!Important

I (for reasons unknown) was unable to get this playable in the browser. However the downloadable version works fine on Windows.

Enjoy :)
